text: Harder na Rass is a dub reggae album by Lincoln Thompson released in 1979. It is the dub for his Experience album. ==Track listing== #"Interstellar Over Dub" #"Second Sight" #"Nebular Dub" #"Time Wharp" #"Universally Dubbed" #"Terrestrial Dub" #"Gravitational Echoes" #"Dub Vortex" #"Regenerated Dub" #"Cosmic Silence" Category:1979 albums Category:Lincoln Thompson albums Category:Dub albums
title: Harder na Rass
